stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements best describes the music played by the trumpets at letter A? (Note that the horns in F sound a perfect fifth lower than notated and the trumpets in B-flat sound a major second lower than notated.)
choicesHtml: The trumpets repeat exactly (at the same pitch) the opening figure played by the horns.
The trumpets repeat, transposed a fifth higher, the opening figure played by the horns.
The trumpets repeat, transposed a second higher, the opening figure played by the horns.
The trumpets introduce material that contrasts with the opening figure played by the horns.
